Text:
** WARNING **
I received a copyright infringement notice from NBC:
"You are being contacted on behalf of NBC Universal and its affiliates ("NBC Universal") because your Internet account was identified as having been used recently to illegally copy and/or distribute the copyrighted movies and/or television shows listed at the bottom of this letter"

At the bottom it said:
"Title:  Law & Order: CI (TV)
Infringement Source:  BitTorrent
Initial Infringement Timestamp:  xx xxx 2012 xx:xx:xx GMT
Recent Infringement Timestamp: xx xxx 2012 xx:xx:xx GMT
Infringing Filename:  Law and Order Criminal Intent S09"
Placed x's to hide some info.
